pages.text: Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Private Events Slide 1 of 7 Slide 2 of 7 Slide 3 of 7 Slide 4 of 7 Slide 5 of 7 Slide 6 of 7 Slide 7 of 7 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides About Our Charleston Event Venue One Broad, the second-floor private venue at Brasserie la Banque boasts expansive views of Charleston's historic South of Broad neighborhood, and offers an elegant setting for intimate dinners and special events. With three unique private event settings, Brasserie La Banque has a space for every occasion. Let Brasserie La Banque help you celebrate life's memorable moments from business happy hours, showers, celebratory dinners, weddings and more. The Brasserie features a selection of traditional French dishes alongside more innovated fare. Please fill out the information below and one of our team members will contact you with information to help reserve our private room for your event. Or email us directly at . labanque@theindigoroad.com For more information and capacities, click an image below. Event Spaces One Broad More Information & Capacities Bar Vauté More Information & Capacities Parlor Room More Information & Capacities Restaurant Buyout More Information & Capacities Book an Event For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 7 Slide 2 of 7 Slide 3 of 7 Slide 4 of 7 Slide 5 of 7 Slide 6 of 7 Slide 7 of 7 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides A "bar clandestin" hidden in plain sight Located beneath French restaurant Brasserie la Banque, Bar Vauté is a destination of its own for after-hours imbibing and enjoyment. The space moonlights as a secluded cocktail bar and evening eatery. When guests descend the building's original historic staircase, they're transported back in time, accentuated by the room's soft lighting, Art Deco influenced furnishings, and intimate bar. One of the only below-street-level bars in the city, Bar Vauté invites locals and visitors alike to indulge in a crepe, cocktail, and a glass, or two, of champagne. Follow Bar Vauté on Instagram Instagram FORBES "Where You Should Go In Charleston Now" Hours & Location The "bar below the street" at Brasserie La Banque We welcome walk-ins on a first-come, first-served basis. 4 PM - 11 PM Monday through Thursday 4 PM - 12 AM Friday and Saturday 3 PM - 9 PM Sunday Apéro Hour Monday through Friday4PM - 6PM Dinner Bar Vauté Beverages Apéro Hour Dinner 4:00pm Every Day Plats Froid & Fruits De Mer Caviar Service 1 ounce of kaluga, french onion mousse, shallots, egg yolk, chives, blini 130 $ Tour de la banque Oysters on the Half Shell, Marinated Shrimp, Smoked Fish Rillettes, Benne Cracker $45 $90 Frenched Oysters crème fraiche, cucumber, champagne mignonette, espelette, caviar 7 $ Chilled Oyster on the Half Shell served with lemon, cocktail sauce, red wine mignonette 1/2 Dozen 24 $ Dozen 48 $ SMOKED FISH RILLETTE House Smoked Salmon, Smoked Trout Roe, Dill, Cucumber à la Creme, Baguette, Radish 16 $ Hors D’ Oeuvres Chef's Selection of Cheeses Rosette de Lyon, Preserves, Olives, Walnuts, Baguette 26 $ Baked Brie Spiced Honey, Rosemary, Fig, Baguette 30 $ French Onion Soup sweet vidalia onion, provolone, croutons 14 $ SALADE DE MAISON lardon, brioche crouton, farm egg, mimolette, champagne vinaigrette 16 $ Sweet & beets Valbreso, Endives, Sweet Potatoes, Pickled Beets, Pecan, Pomegranate, Radish, Lemon Honey Vinaigrette 18 $ Escargots shallots, garlic, pernod, fines herbes, brioche crumb, baguette 19 $ L'Abattoir Steak Frites pommes frites, sauce de la banque 6oz NY STRIP 39 $ 12oz NY STRIP 71 $ add bordelaise 8 $ Duck a l’orange honey-glazed duck breast, sauce bigarade, marmalade squash, watercress, pistachio 49 $ La Mer Scallops Cauliflower a la Polonaise, Story Farm Egg, Caper, Garlic, Fines 39 $ Market Catch Sunchoke Veloute, Black Truffle & Hazelnut Tapenade, Brown Butter, Spring Onion 47 $ À Partager Petits Pains housemade brioche, whipped butter 7 $ Pommes Frites sauce de la banque 8 $ RATATOUILLE squash, eggplant, zucchini, tomato 10 $ Brussel Sprout roquefort Apple, Bacon, Pecan, Sherry Gastrique 10 $ Gluten-free and vegetarian options available upon request. Offerings include seasonally driven hors d’oeuvres, crudités, and entrees, as well as innovative raw bar preparations.
